attributes.background: I have been in many school and there are kids that get bullied all the time. As far as bullying loads of people are getting bullied with racism. This has happened to me before. This other kid in my school said put your hand on the table and then he said they both match don't they.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle racism in schools.
